item.title: Get a data science job with no experience.
item.description: Data science is a very popular industry and it continues to grab the attention for a lot of people. You get to harness and quantify data, while also getting an amazing paycheck. That being said, getting into this field can be difficult. Which is why you want to target some entry level data science jobs at first. However, you need to make sure that you avoid any possible mistakes that might appear.
